data.title: MusicMobilized: A KC Symphony Documentary
data.text:
A CIRCLE M FILMS PRODUCTION

Presenting…MusicMobilized: A KC Symphony Documentary. In the midst of a pandemic, the Kansas City Symphony launched the Mobile Music Box project. Free concerts are presented in every zip code throughout metropolitan Kansas City on the Mobile Music Box stage, bringing joy to thousands of symphonic music fans while introducing many to the art form for the very first time. Please enjoy this documentary about the KC Symphony’s Mobile Music Box. And THANK YOU for enthusiastically supporting our efforts. It’s all for you.

The Kansas City Symphony’s Mobile Music Box is bringing live orchestral music to every zip in the KC metro. Enjoy this 60 second preview of our new MusicMobilized documentary about the Mobile Music Box and its impact on our community.

You may see it cruising down a highway near you, or set up in a local park, library or community center. In one minute, learn more about the Kansas City Symphony’s Mobile Music Box stage and how it helps our KC Symphony musicians bring music to every zip code in the metro area.
